itemInfo.itemDesc: Water Gathered from the sea using an Empty Bottle. It can be modified, or used as an ingredient in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: Sea Water can be obtained by using an Empty Bottle by the sea.

item.name: Salt
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vender or Innkeeper.

item.name: Sun-Dried Salt
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vender or Innkeeper.
